撥.definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc; to dial; to allocate; to set aside (money); to poke (the fire); to pluck (a string instrument); to turn round; classifier: group, batch

撥亂反正.definition: bring order out of chaos; set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder

撥冗.definition: to find time to do sth in the midst of pressing affairs

撥出.definition: to pull out; to allocate (funds); to dial

撥動.definition: to stir; to prod; to poke; to move sideways; to strum (on a guitar etc)

撥弄.definition: to move to and fro (with hand, foot, stick etc); to fiddle with; to stir up

撥弦樂器.definition: plucked string or stringed instrument; plucked instrument

撥浪鼓.definition: rattle drum; pellet drum – a hand drum with two pellets attached to strings on either side, mounted on a rod that is twirled to make the pellets strike the drum (used in ritual music, as a children's toy or as a street vendor's noisemaker)

撥轉.definition: to turn; to turn around; to transfer (funds etc)

撥通.definition: to get through to sb on the phone

撥開.definition: to push aside; to part; to brush away

撥雲見日.definition: lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
